title: Nanopore adaptive sampling effectively enriches bacterial plasmids
details: U Jens-Uwe, E Lennard, P Tanja, W Birgit, S Kerstin… - MSystems, 2024
abstract: Bacterial plasmids play a major role in the spread of antibiotic resistance genes. However, their characterization via DNA sequencing suffers from the low abundance of plasmid DNA in those samples. Although sample preparation methods can enrich …
